announcement.text: This is an unofficial multilingual translation site for ui-ux-pro-max-skill.

hero.subtitle: Searchable database of UI styles, color palettes, font pairings, chart types, and UX guidelines. Build beautiful interfaces with AI-powered design recommendations.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: Follow these steps to go from prompt to a complete design system in minutes.

step1.title: 1) Install the Skill
step1.body: Install UI UX Pro Max directly inside Claude Code.

step2.title: 2) Generate a Design System
step2.body: Run the generator and let it recommend layout, style, colors, typography, and UX rules.

tip.title: Tip
tip.body: You can mention your preferred stack (React/Next.js/etc.), or let it default to HTML + Tailwind.

demo.title: Watch the Flow
demo.subtitle: See how your prompt turns into a tailored design system.

videoMissing.title: Demo video not found
videoMissing.body: Add a file at public/demo.mp4 or switch to the animation tab.

demo.videoHint: Tip: You can replace the demo video by dropping demo.mp4 into the public folder.

gettingStarted.title: What is UI/UX Pro Max?
gettingStarted.description: Learn about the core features of this AI design intelligence skill.

designSystemGenerator.title: How It Works
designSystemGenerator.description: From prompt to code in just four steps.

cliReference.title: Installation Guide
cliReference.description: Install the skill for your AI assistant: Claude, Cursor, Windsurf, and more.

examples.title: How to Use
examples.description: Invocation patterns and example prompts, organized by AI assistant.

gettingStarted.overview: UI UX Pro Max is a design intelligence skill that turns a single prompt into professional UI/UX decisions across style, color, typography, layout, and UX rules.

highlights.title: Design System Generator
highlights.desc: Generate pattern, style, colors, typography, and key effects.

highlights.title: Searchable Database
highlights.desc: Query styles, palettes, fonts, charts, landing patterns, and UX guidelines.

highlights.title: Stack-aware Output
highlights.desc: Get recommendations tailored to your framework and stack.

whatsNew.title: What's new in v2.0
whatsNew.body: Version 2.0 adds a reasoning engine that produces complete, project-specific design systems.

items.title: Intelligent Design System Generation
items.desc: Analyze your product type and goals to recommend pattern, style, colors, and typography.

items.title: Reasoning Engine
items.desc: 100 industry rules rank and filter results to avoid common anti-patterns.

items.title: Pre-delivery Checklist
items.desc: Quality gates for accessibility, hover states, motion, and responsive breakpoints.

features.title: What you get
items: 57 UI styles, from minimalism and brutalism to AI-native and bento grids.
95 color palettes tailored to SaaS, e-commerce, healthcare, fintech, and more.
56 font pairings with Google Fonts imports and Tailwind-ready configs.
24 chart types with library recommendations and usage notes.
11 tech stacks supported with framework-specific guidance.
98 UX guidelines plus 100 reasoning rules for professional polish.

defaultStack.title: Default stack behavior
defaultStack.body: If you don‚Äôt specify a stack, it defaults to HTML + Tailwind.

prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
prerequisites.body: Make sure Python is installed before using the CLI search tool.

install.title: Install
install.body: Choose the installation method that fits your workflow.

quickstart.title: Your First Run
quickstart.body: Start with the Design System Generator, then refine with domain/stack searches.

gettingStarted.next: Continue to Design System Generator for the deep dive and the pre-delivery checklist.

dsg.overview: From prompt to code in just four steps. AI automatically searches the design database to recommend the best matching design system for you.

workflow.title: Four-Step Workflow
workflow.subtitle: From prompt to code in just four steps

steps.title: You Ask
steps.desc: Request any UI/UX task: build, design, create, implement, review, fix, improve

steps.title: Skill Activates
steps.desc: AI automatically searches the design database for relevant styles, colors, typography, and guidelines

steps.title: Smart Recommendations
steps.desc: Finds the best matching design system based on your product type and requirements

steps.title: Code Generation
steps.desc: Implements UI with correct colors, fonts, spacing, and best practices

dsg.next: Next: check the Installation Guide to install the skill for your AI assistant.

cli.overview: Choose the installation method that fits your workflow and inject design intelligence into your AI assistant.

step3.title: Install skill for your AI assistant
commands: uipro init --ai all           # All AI assistants

manualInstall.description: If you prefer manual installation, simply copy the corresponding folders to your project:

prerequisites.description: The search script requires Python 3.x environment support.

otherCommands.title: Other CLI Commands
commands: uipro update                # Update to latest version
uipro init --version v1.0.0 # Install specific version

cli.next: Next: see Usage & Prompts for invocation patterns and sample requests.

examples.overview: Choose the activation method based on your AI assistant.

usage.title: How to Use
usage.subtitle: Choose the activation method based on your AI assistant

assistants.name: Claude Code
assistants.description: The skill activates automatically. Just chat naturally:
assistants.example: Build a landing page for my SaaS product

assistants.name: Cursor / Windsurf / Antigravity
assistants.description: Use slash command to invoke the skill:
assistants.example: /ui-ux-pro-max Build a landing page for my SaaS product

assistants.name: Kiro
assistants.description: Type / in chat to see available commands, then select ui-ux-pro-max:

assistants.name: GitHub Copilot
assistants.description: In VS Code, type / to see available prompts, select ui-ux-pro-max:

assistants.name: Gemini / Qoder / Roo Code
assistants.example: /ui-ux-pro-max Build a landing page for my SaaS product

assistants.name: Codex CLI
assistants.example: $ui-ux-pro-max Build a landing page for my SaaS product

assistants.name: Continue
assistants.description: The skill activates automatically, just chat:
assistants.example: Build a landing page for my SaaS product

assistants.name: Trae (SOLO mode)
assistants.description: Need to explicitly specify frontend only:
assistants.example: Build a landing page for my SaaS product (frontend ONLY)

prompts.title: üí° Example Prompts
prompts.body: Here are some practical prompt examples you can use directly or adjust to your needs:
items: Build a landing page for my SaaS product
Design a personal portfolio website with dark mode
Make a mobile UI for an e-commerce app

examples.next: Next: check the FAQ if you run into setup or command issues.

items.a: It lives under .claude/skills/ui-ux-pro-max/scripts/search.py in your project.

items.q: Do I need to specify a stack?
items.a: No. If omitted, it defaults to HTML + Tailwind.

items.q: How do I get Markdown output?
Can I install without GitHub access?
items.a: Yes. Use uipro init --offline to skip the GitHub download and use bundled assets.

faq.next: If something still feels unclear, send feedback at the bottom of the page.

features.title: Everything You Need for Beautiful UI
features.subtitle: Comprehensive design intelligence at your fingertips. Search, discover, and implement stunning interfaces with AI-powered recommendations.

styles.title: Design Styles
styles.description: Glassmorphism, Neumorphism, Minimalism, Brutalism, Aurora UI, and 45+ more styles with colors, effects, and framework compatibility.

colors.title: Color Palettes
colors.description: Product-specific color systems for SaaS, E-commerce, Healthcare, Fintech, and more. Includes Primary, Secondary, CTA, Background, Text, and Border.

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: 50+ font pairings with Google Fonts integration, Tailwind configs, and mood-based recommendations.

charts.title: Chart Types
charts.description: Data visualization recommendations with library suggestions (Chart.js, Recharts, D3.js) and accessibility notes.

landing.title: Landing Patterns
landing.description: 14 conversion-optimized page structures with CTA placement strategies and color recommendations.

ux.title: UX Guidelines
ux.description: Best practices and anti-patterns for animation, accessibility, z-index, loading states, and more.

howItWorks.subtitle: From prompt to production-ready UI in 6 intelligent steps

1.title: Your Prompt
1.prompt: Build a landing page for a pet grooming service. Playful and friendly style, with booking CTA.

2.title: AI Reasoning
2.searching: ‚Üí Searching: product, style, typography, color, landing, ux domains...

techStacks.title: 11 Tech Stacks Supported
techStacks.subtitle: Framework-specific best practices, patterns, and code examples. Get guidelines tailored to your technology stack.

gallery.title: 39 Website Demos Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Browse real-world website demos built with UI UX Pro Max. Click to view live demos.
gallery.readySubtitle: Get started with UI UX Pro Max skill for Claude Code. Design intelligence at your fingertips.

feedback.title: Was this page helpful?
feedback.subtitle: Your feedback helps improve the tutorial and examples.
feedback.privacy: No backend: stored locally until you submit
feedback.detailsPlaceholder: Tell us what was confusing or missing, and what you expected to see.

footer.description: Design intelligence skill for Claude Code. Searchable database of UI styles, color palettes, font pairings, and UX guidelines.
footer.builtWith: Built with React + Tailwind CSS (by UI UX Pro Max)
